body.p:
Franklin Circuit Court:
Hon. Gov. Bramlitte:
On last night the following persons escaped from the Franklin County Jail:
Alexander Burke ^a small man about 25 years of age^ charged with the crime of murdering Thomas Wallace: also
Ab. Bridgeford, a small man, with sandy hair, about 35 years of age, charged with shooting his wife; also,
Wm. Johnson, about 28 years old, weighing about 140 pounds, convicted to 1 years imprisonment in the Kentucky Penitentiary ^for Grand Larceny:^: also
John Anderson, weighing about 160 pounds, dark complexion, about f 40 years of age, charged with Grand Larceny:

The Governor of Kentucky is earnestly requested to offer suitable rewards for the apprehension of these person, so escaped from the Jail of Franklin County:
Feb. 24, 1864.

Geo. C. Drane
Ct Judge 8th Jud Dis.

$2500 for Burke
20150 for Bridgeford
150 for Wm Johnson
150 for John Anderson
